message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the problem of catastrophic forgetting in deep learning, which is a common issue in machine learning and falls under the category of continual learning. The proposed method is specifically applied to image classification, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The method involves using an adversarial loss, which is a popular technique in generative models and falls under the category of deep learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of memory networks, which is a subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper involves natural language processing techniques such as cross-entropy loss, which falls under computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the paper involves neural networks, which is a subfield of neural engineering (cs.NE).
